name: 蘇昱瑋
objective: This course includes two main parts: (1) Introduction of first-order ordinary differential equations, second-order and higher-order linear differential equations, including physics problems or other problems to derive differential equations, and solve them in a practical importance simple method. (2) Linear algebra, matrix, vector, determinant and linear equations can be applied in the optimized calculation process of circuits and mechanics.
schedule:
week 1~3: 1st order, 2nd ODEs
week 4~6: Higher order ODE
week 7, 8: ODE in engineering problems
week 9: midterm
week 10~12: Laplace transform, series solution
week 13~14: Special functions
week 15~17: Matrix
week 18: final exame
materials:
Advanced Engineering Mathematics
Erwin Kreyszig, Wiley 11th edition.
consultation: 建立班級 line 群組。Office hour.
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG9：產業創新與基礎設施（Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure）
課程是否導入AI: ● 使用生成式 AI 作為教學過程的輔助工具（Use generative AI tools as an aid to the teaching process）
